text: The KYC mentor question caused me to get in touch with my favorite mentor and invite him to visit, ... Are there any events or  good times for that to happen?

<@U02F8TTPU>: great question! March is a pretty light month, event wise! Take a look at the team calendar to see all upcoming events :) and stay tuned for an updated events process very soon. But in the meantime, keep me in the loop and I can help you plan a time for your mentor visit that doesn't conflict with any studio plans!
